The plot of this classic film revolves around the adventures of Peter Pan, who is a mischievous and impulsive young boy who possesses extraordinary abilities that allow him to fly unaided using his bare hands in the air as he moves freely through the air without having to use any kind of special device or equipment to help him achieve this remarkable ability.
